question: Q1;1;What needs to be done to run no coding AI?
response:
Condition 1: To run no coding AI, one would need to use platforms or tools that offer drag-and-drop interfaces or pre-built AI models that can be easily customized without the need to write any code. 

Condition 2: Running no coding AI involves utilizing user-friendly platforms or tools that facilitate the creation and deployment of AI models without the need for coding skills. These tools typically offer intuitive interfaces, drag-and-drop functionalities, and pre-built AI models that can be easily customized to suit specific needs. Essentially, no coding AI simplifies the process of developing AI applications, making it accessible to individuals with varying levels of technical expertise.
